author: Valentina Pop
title: Suspect in Paris Attacks Convicted in Brussels Shootout
text:
BRUSSELSâ€”The only suspected assailant still alive after the 2015 Islamic State attacks in Paris was sentenced to 20 years in prison on Monday for his involvement months later in a shootout with police officers in Belgium.
Salah Abdeslam, a 28-year-old French national who grew up in Brussels, and an accomplice were convicted in Belgian court on Monday of attempted terrorist murder of police officers and the possession of illegal firearms, said court president Luc Hennart.
